---
title: Get Guild Emoji
category: Emoji
order: 2
---

# `getGuildEmoji`

```php
$client->emoji->getGuildEmoji($parameters);
```

## Description



## Parameters


Name | Type | Required | Default
--- | --- | --- | ---
guild.id | snowflake | true | *null*
emoji.id | string | true | *null*

## Response

Returns an emoji object for the given guild and emoji IDs.

Can Return:

* emoji
